introduction.sub-context: An engineer, a software developer. I specifically work into MERN stack and native android development. I also have interests in robotics and mechatronics and I constantly look for opportunities to work in the domains

about-me.description: I love machines. I've loved working on wierd things. I am one of those who opens up every mechanical / computer device just to see how it works, and then sometimes fails to join it back. Not a single abandoned smart phone has ever survived from me, at least in my home. Other than that, I love building things from scratch. I've worked with Start-Ups. I love to believe in people, and their ideas. I've used the word 'love' so many times since I do everything by my heart. Now, before that makes me emotional, let's continue...

work-experience.description: Crypso is a crypto based social media application that enabled users to have the luxury of a free social revolving around Crypto and also trade through the same. Users could create signals for coin prices indicating their followers about the ups and downs of the same.

Technodds is a Student-Faculty startup at Aurangabad. Technodds was started in COVID period to equip the people with tools to fight COVID19. During my period, I worked on javascript technologies and application development.

I joined as a Data-Entry Operator, and then I was promoted to Quality Checking Process. This was a non-technical work. I was involved into multiple processes since I learnt a thing about time utilisation.
